properties.attr-onclick:
<script>
  $(document).ready(function() {
    // Attach a click event listener to the button
    $('#pay_with_razorpay').on('click', function() {
      // Get the value from the field dynamically (replace 'trailGame_pymtList.razorpay_payment_link' with your actual field name)
      var paymentLink = $('#form\\.trailGame_pymtList\\.razorpay_payment_link').val(); 
      
      // Check if the payment link is not empty
      if(paymentLink) {
        // Redirect to the Razorpay payment link
        window.location.href = paymentLink;
      } else {
        alert('Payment link is missing.');
      }
    });
  });
</script>
